com.novartis.opensource.yada.io

Class ADFHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.novartis.opensource.yada.io.FileHelper
      • com.novartis.opensource.yada.io.TabHelper
        • com.novartis.opensource.yada.io.ADFHelper

  • public class ADFHelper
extends TabHelper
    ADFHelper is for files in Adnan Derti format. These are tab-delimited files with the following fileheader: 
    __sample name: 22RV1
__species: human
__sample type: cell.line
__alignment program: TopHat v1.3.KornMod
__expression program: Cufflinks v2.0
__contents: FPKM
__no transcript: ---
__BEGINDATA
    The column header is on the next line, line 9.
    Author:
    David Varon
